purpose: Standardized schema for internal communication, status updates, and fault logging across the Governance Triumvirate, ensuring non-repudiable audit trails (CALS logging).

schema.vrrm_pointer: String (Pointer to the entry in VRRM detailing rationale, required for CRITICAL/TERMINAL events)
schema.payload_hash: SHA256 (Hash of the state transition input context relevant to this stage)

reasoning: The system requires a defined inter-agent communication standard to robustly handle failure hierarchy and audit requirements (S9/NRALS logging). While manifest contents define policy, STES defines the protocol for communicating the *result* of those policy checks, ensuring efficient tracing and remediation triage during CRITICAL failures. This decouples communication from core policy data structure definition.
